report.title: It Is a Seeker's Drug (Poem)
report.author: PM
report.bodytext: and it's well-spaced /n 'Sunday, March 22 - 2009' /n so i haven't lit since /n election night /n ========================================= /n I was baptized under the showerhead /n I was sewn upon the ground /n /n there is not one moment with you that i do not receive /n some intimate information about my nature or what my body is requesting /n the in in in in's are beginning to shuffle mmm wmmm mm /n /n it is god's garden, /n it's the angel's hedgerows /n /n it spurs me with dense rushes telling me to stay from technology /n this time I'll break it /n it shows me my placement from all surrounding angles /n ===================================================== /n it gives me a new eye for the natural world /n like a dead man usurping an infant's face to view a field once again /n it is lifting oneself out of Hades in order to vview the bluue pink and yellow once morre /n the smile carries it out /n and Mephistopheles or whoever pulls you back in again /n -=================--=================---- /n it disarms and de-panels the ideal /n like blown solar plates /n it is the satellite of the world /n you'll stay in the dark room and still hear the static telepathy /n you'll still feel the hot sun like it's being sent back in on a discus of light /n --------------------------------==== /n it inspires capitulation /n it is a one-word judgment without malice, /n just peeeeeeling the answers back /n like a sticker's back /n it is understanding all /n -----=========================== /n it is turning my body to thousands of leaves twistling down and off a tree's bark /n it is becoming the leaf-pile and being blown into liquid propeller leaves /n it is all of fall's colours surrounded with deep lush greens /n it is the palm frond cocoon /n set at perfect temperature /n it is 'WHAT IS IT THAT REALLY MATTERS?' in Hollywood's best god voice /n and recognizing that is a new sensation in the skin /n /n ----------------------------=== /n -------my whole /n system is ------------=== /n reporting--------------------------------== /n ----------------------== /n -----=== /n ----------------== /n /n it is nature's last defense against the unnatural /n it's the ghost in the highway /n it is the manual (instructions) /n shifting to manual (setting) /n /n it is the ever-reclining race car /n the roller-coaster network of neurons /n it is the limb-loggering high-jump /n /n it is a warm vat for the satyr /n it is the lei garland necklace that you get off the plane in Hawaii /n /n it is the ecstatic, imperfect mess /n spliced frames /n unsequenced until you can cut-and-paste the moments and truly live them /n not reading the instructions to the nerves and cells /n /n all in-between thoughts have been banished for the constant flourish /n it is a tactile heaven gym-court /n know that you don't /n have to live five seconds in the future of each fragment /n /n it is all the drapery being shook and thrown off and down the street /n IT IS THE FIRE WITH THE FINGER SNAP. /n it is placing your mind in the CD tray ----and ACTUALLY GETTING TO LISTEN.----- /n ----------------------------------------------------------------------------============ /n =============================================================================== /n -------------------------------------------------------------------------------======== /n realizing there are more channels devoted to you than you can ever flip the cards on /n /n it is that touch-and-go foreign language you keep threatening to invent /n it's getting a brand new bellows to breathe with /n stomping down stairs by the stained glass /n up by the church organ /n and it's knowing EXACTLY how to play that church organ /n and getting to play it your way at 7am for a well-lit church congregation /n taking the top down off of the cathedral /n then being seated at a plate /n of sunny side up eggs afterward /n all yellow and white /n just like me /n because I'm pure /n AM I? mostly /n /n it is knowing the music-tracks on every incense stick /n and smiling knowingly to your friend /n when you come across it in your record collection /n it means getting to share that laugh, /n knowing you're both in two completely different places /n grabbing hands over great distances /n /n it is a profound thought /n being served to you every day at the same time /n in your cranberry purple, yellow-covered reform school /n it is every noon a school class trip /n to some fond, vague, Austrian meadowland /n you'll be seated upfront /n with your pupils pushed back /n /n leaping at lilies like cheap puppets /n 'SHOWING THE DOG HIS OWN FACE' /n /n it is the wood of the cabin and /n THE TORSION OF THE SLUG HEADING DOWN THE STEEL /n with no salt around /n ------------=====================--------------- /n all blue green now /n its the cut leather swaying on native clothing /n the gentle breeze /n --------------============-------------- /n it is the nerve-ending dance which no composer has written for yet /n no one has tried /n then you realize nothing decent has been done yet /n BUT IIT WIILLL! /n /n it is getting to swim in the crystal lake with its light-red-yellow-blue divers and /n gemmed stalactites /n /n it is the whole wealth of personalities known /n at your fondest perusal /n it is 'REMEMBER THAT BEAUTIFUL FACE THAT YOU NEVER LOVED?' /n it is falling on your back on your seat letting nerves charge /n electrified in jolts /n it is letting things fly at full mast /n it is getting the soul's autograph and going home on the bus of life happy /n it is foot-peddling the ceiling like an infant /n rolling-ovrrr like a bohemian jaguar right after a rest in the jungle's core /n /n is it sparking all the kindling on the smile /n it is fine ways of transmitting insights into humanity /n /n it's moving like you can breathe underwater /n /n IT IS THE FROSTY BOB-SLED RUN OUT /n into the verdant valley /n it is more fun than you can record /n far better than any mass experience /n /n ===============================================--------=============---------- /n --------------=================---------------==============--------------========= /n it is always telling you to leap to your feet /n fall back into a pillow if you want to have a downtime /n /n you'll find it's also all the stripes on the pillow come off on your back /n it is all those psychedelic viewfinders from childhood /n slights of the optics /n /n thrills from those magic eye posters /n with the hidden image that none of the teachers could see /n or a magic mirror which reflects us all /n /n it is the third-eye chromatrope /n it is visionary company /n ============================================--------================== /n /n it is the prismatic train taking looonnnng leeeaaaps off the track /n taking higher strides each time /n /n it is anything that prevents your father from talking /n it is the FF>> wedding to post-ritual speech /n it is leaping on the plush chair savage-like /n and throwing a leg over it carelessly like an angel on a tuft of cloud /n it is stretching your legs and doing chores that would've bored you /n exercises that can't begin to exert you /n art that spindles out of you in a daze /n part of the nameless, but /n un-ashed hours /n ======================================== /n ---------------------------------------- /n it is nothing like its been made out to be /n you should be ashamed of calling it anything but what it is /n it's bedfeathers without concerns, /n it is a re-connector...
